itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Bronze Dagger
item.desc: A dagger cast in bronze.

item.name: Bronze Dagger of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Bronze Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Bronze Dagger of Temptation, Bronze Dagger

item.name: Bronze Dagger of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bronze Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Bronze Dagger of Destruction, Bronze Dagger

item.name: Bronze Dagger of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bronze Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Bronze Dagger of Crimson Flame, Bronze Dagger

item.name: Ultimate Bronze Dagger
item.desc: A Bronze Dagger developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Bronze Dagger of Crimson Flame, Bronze Dagger of Destruction, Bronze Dagger of Temptation, Bronze Dagger

item.name: Ultimate Incense Trinket
item.desc: An Incense Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Crimson Flame, Incense Trinket of Destruction, Incense Trinket of Temptation, Incense Trinket

item.name: Incense Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Incense Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Temptation, Incense Trinket

item.name: Silver Embroidered Alchemist's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Alchemists.

item.name: Incense Trinket
item.desc: A trinket with a pouch full of incense.
